Class EdgePopup

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.MenuElement
public class EdgePopup
extends javax.swing.JPopupMenu

A popup menu providing operations to modify or delete an edge. TODO enable Symmetrize command after the command has been debugged and tested.

Author:
Helen Bretzke
